basics.name: Willy Ovalle
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Willy has been around software development for the last 7 years. Team focused, proactive, I'm always looking for new things to learn and to share among my teammates. When I'm not coding for work, I'm scratching my head trying to make new shining leds to turn on with my Arduino based circuits or making jokes about why my Raspberry Pi doesn't want to turn on again.

education.studyType: Science of Networking and System Administration

education.institution: Pontificia Universidad Católica Madre y Maestra

work.name: Klarna
highlights: Maintaining our Payment Selector project that serves millions of monthly users in 9 core markets and more than 150+ countries.
Working in design and implementation of dozens of A/B tests, driving conversion rate up by up to 15% in several markets.
Contributing to the design and the overall internal paradigm shift in our company services involving 10+ teams.
Balancing prioritization of new feature development and addressing technical debt in our product.
Technologies: React, NodeJS, Typescript

work.name: AIME - Artificial Intelligence in Medical Epidemiology

Developed integrations with Google Maps Geolocalization API, Google Maps JS API, Forecast.IO.
Designed and implemented the API used by our iOS/Android apps.
Technologies: .NET, NUnit, Github, waffle.io, SQL Server, GeoSpatial Data Analysis.

- Full Stack engineer using cutting edge .NET backend technologies and Razor/jQuery in the front end. -
- Helped to develop the software responsible of analyzing and predicting Dengue outbreaks in developing countries.
- Developed integrations with Google Maps Geolocalization API, Google Maps JS API, Forecast.IO. 
- Designed and implemented the API used by our iOS/Android apps.

work.name: Tenfold
highlights: Helped the company grow over 2000% in revenue in one year.
Developed five new integrations with third parties CRM's (Zendesk, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, SmartOffice CRM for Financial Advisors, Oracle CRM On Demand, Netsuite CRM).
Made many customizations to our product to meet the requirements of our small and large customers.
Implemented an API Server written in C# using ASP.NET MVC5 and other Microsoft technologies.
Technologies: NodeJS, MongoDB, AngularJS, ExpressJS, Git, Github, Slack, Gulp.
work.summary:
Tenfold (formely Callinize) connects your CRM and phone system in 5 minutes to solve common sales problems. We help you hit your monthly sales goals by enforcing sales best practices across your team. As a remote software engineer at Tenfold I had the opportunity to work in many interesting projects.

- Helped the company grow over 2000% in revenue in one year.
- Developed five new integrations with third parties CRM's (Zendesk, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, SmartOffice CRM for Financial Advisors, Oracle CRM On Demand, Netsuite CRM).
- Made many customizations to our product to meet the requirements of our small and large customers.
- Implemented an API Server written in C# using ASP.NET MVC5 and other Microsoft technologies.
- Technologies we used on daily basis: NodeJS, MongoDB, AngularJS, ExpressJS, Git, Github, Slack, Gulp, Grunt, among others.

work.name: Superintendencia de Salud y Riesgos Laborales
highlights: Implemented the "Subsidies Extraordinary" (Subsidios Extraordinarios) project that helps poor Dominican mothers to get government help if, for any reason, they couldn't complete the process for receiving maternity or breastfeeding benefits.
Created a new subsidies evaluation platform that increased productivity among the evaluators by 27% within 3 months after the implementation.
Technologies: SQL Server, ASP.Net MVC, C#, Bootstrap, jQuery, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Microsoft Dynamics GP, Reporting Services, Integration Services.
work.summary:
- Ensure compliance with safety measures, information systems, and access gained with regard to  systems under my responsibility. 
- Receive and evaluate system improvements requirements. 
- Quality assurance, monitoring, and maintenance of systems development and publishing to the production environment. 
- Implemented the "Subsidies Extraordinary" (Subsidios Extraordinarios) project that helps poor Dominican mothers to get government help if, for any reason, they couldn't complete the process for receiving maternity or breastfeeding benefits.
- Created a new subsidies evaluation platform that increased productivity among the 
evaluators by 27% in a three months timeframe.
- Technologies used on daily basis: SQL Server, ASP.Net MVC, C#, Bootstrap, jQuery, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Microsoft Dynamics GP, Reporting Services, Integration Services.

projects.name: Fireorm
projects.description: Fireorm is an ongoing open source project that I've been working on, it has 250+ stars in github and is used by dozens of other projects. Fireorm is a tiny wrapper on top of firebase-admin that makes life easier when dealing with a Firestore database. Fireorm tries to ease the development of apps that rely on Firestore at the database layer by abstracting the access layer providing and familiar repository pattern. It basically helps us not worrying about Firestore details and focusing in what matters: adding cool new features!
